Package cards

package cards
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractCard
    Class that represents properties that any card will have.
    CardType
    Interface that is used for polymorphism in AbstractCard.
    CardValue
    Interface that is used for polymorphism in AbstractCard.
    PlayingCard
    Class that represents a standard playing card from a 52-card deck.
    PlayingCard.Rank
    Enum that represents all rank possibilities.
    PlayingCard.Suit
    enum that represents all possible suits of a card.
    UnoCard
    Class that represents an Uno Card, extends AbstractCard
    UnoCard.Color
    Enum representing the color of the card.
    UnoCard.Value
    Enum represeting the Value of the card.
